revised_title: Ancient Camps in Hampshire: A Letter from Mr. Tho. Wright to James Theobald, Esq.
tldr: In a letter to James Theobald, Mr. Tho. Wright describes two ancient camps in Hampshire, England, and their possible connection to Aurelius Ambrosius' battles with the Saxons. He also mentions a local tradition of a battle between the Saxons and the Danes nearby, and the existence of Windmill Nap, an artificial hill believed to have been a beacon.
